sentence: The room did not have a good view
We put in a requested for a double bed that was not available so they gave us the roll away bed but fitted tightly in our room so switched to a corner room with lots of window loved it
Although Washington traffic is noisy with honking and whistles the rooms are fairly quiet and I was right by the elevator as well
I asked 3 times about the room being defeathered and the refrigerator each time I was told that it was taken care of
If there is a fridge in a room a guest ought to be able to use it
No refrigerator 59 a day to park
The room service food was not good
There are very noisy ice machines directly beside guest rooms and the walls are thin
Went to get ice from different floor but forgot to bring my key card so had to go back to the room dragging my leg
In reality the room itself was exactly the same as a normal room as far as I could tell except that it was on one of the highest floors but across from another tall building so not a great view
First time in Washington DC We enjoyed the Madison Hilton dc everyone was nice Breakfast was very good room are clean The concierge Kaouthar was great
Our room faced 15th st and was surprisingly quiet
We thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of our stay including the rooms which were spacious clean and nice
The hotel is centrally location Near the White House and the national mall The good is so good The room
She quickly found me a room that was ready
I loved our room it was beautiful
Room was clean quiet and had good hvac
Rooms super clean quiet and hotel was close to everything
Stayed in suite with balcony

Hot water in the bathroom is acceptable in temperature and heater works perfectly at the desired warmthI like that the cleaning staff is very quiet and you will never feel bothered you will be given full privacy using the door tag if you do not need much housekepingThe 3 elevators are fast and perfect I never had to wait and they open and close quicklyConcierge service was great
